name: Vital Strike
description: launches a vicious attack seeking your most vulnerable opening.

name: Hasten
description: concentrates, and their movements speed up.

name: Seamseek
description: bypasses your armor with a carefully-placed attack.

name: Lacerate
description: opens your artery, causing your to bleed profusely.

name: Flurry
description: attacks you four times in a blur of motion.

name: Perfect Dodge
description: readies themself to dodge your next attack.
